name: Habit Puzzles
description:
Habit Puzzles merges your habit tracker with your Jigsaw Puzzle obsession. Customize the game with all the habits, chores, and projects in your life, then reward yourself by unlocking jigsaw pieces whenever you stay on target.

Features 20 puzzling scenes by award-winning photojournalist Trent Nelson

EARLY ACCESS INFO:

  • The core features of Habit Puzzles are in place, but many more features and a wider selection of puzzle content is in the works.
  • You may find bugs or annoying quirks in the Early Access version, which will be updated with improvements frequently, so you should install it through the Itch desktop app to stay up to date.
  • Comments, bug reports, feature requests, etc. are more than welcome in the discussion board. Let me know how you're using Habit Puzzles and if it helps improve your life!
  • The game is currently free to help me get feedback and gauge whether a market exists for it. I can't guarantee the game will ever be "finished" or that it will always be free.
